attributes.action: Make St Georges Day a Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England lags far behind the rest of Europe and the world in the number of bank holidays we get. A bank holiday on Saint Georges Day would be a great opportunity for all the English (regardless of colour or religion) to recognise what binds us together - instead of concentrating on our differences.
Northern Ireland already has a bank holiday on St. Patrick's Day, the Scottish Parliament has introduced a bill to make St. Andrew's Day a bank holiday and the Welsh Assembly agree that St. David's Day should be a holiday.
Help me persuade the government to give England a bank holiday on St Georges Day.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
